text: We have video chat in courtyard now

Same setup as echo - invite the room and it will show up in its calendar and hangouts page
<@U02918BKW>: Thinking about the library as dedicated adidas space, we're thinking it might be good to get a heater that fills a room versus the small electric heater we've got in there. Thoughts?
yeah. it'd still be electric powered. anyone else think well of the oil heaters like this: <http://www.amazon.com/DeLonghi-TRH0715-Oil-Filled-Radiator/dp/B000FT1XZW>

text: it works well except when it decides to trip the resettable breaker that for some reason isn't accessible unless you take off the front panel
also 1500W is 12.5amps so basically a whole circuit
in case you want anything else in there
20 amp circuits in that room. one for west wall plugs. one for south and east walls
